name: Tower of Time (itch)
description:
'Tower of Time' is a tower defence game where you have to protect your hourglass from the shadowy monsters trying to eat the time inside it, in order to do that, you need to build defences by using time as a currency, defeat monsters to increase your time. When there's no time left, you've lost.

This was the first game I've ever released, made with my own engine with lwjgl. Made in about a week for GameDev.tv Community Game Jam.

A link to the GitHub repository containing the game's source code is found in the text file contained in the tower_of_time.zip folder.
